summary.span: 命名空间提供了一些类，通过这些类可以访问 ASP.NET 窗体身份验证、角色和配置文件应用程序服务，如 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 服务。

span.span: The namespace provides classes that enable you to access ASP.NET forms authentication, roles, and profiles application services as Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ， ，和类包含的方法，可让您登录用户、 检查哪些角色当前用户属于，和检索用户通过 WCF 服务的配置文件属性。The , , and classes contain methods that let you log on users, check which roles the current user belongs to, and retrieve profile properties for the user through WCF services. 命名空间还包含以下类：The namespace also includes the following classes: - 它用于自定义身份验证 cookie 从类。, which is used to customize the authentication cookie from the class. - 用于在运行时选择成员资格提供程序。, which is used to select the membership provider at run time. - 用于在运行时选择的角色提供程序。, which is used to select the role provider at run time. - 用于创建自定义验证的用户配置文件属性。, which is used to create custom validation for user profile properties.
